data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Patuakhali prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Patuakhali, Barisal, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,529,368 lost people in  Patuakhali, Barisal, Bangladesh have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 798 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Patuakhali.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Patuakhali, Barisal, Bangladesh to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Nikari (Muslim traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Lord, please give the 1,924 believers in the county of Patuakhali the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Patuakhali, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary:
the county of Patuakhali, Barisal, Bangladesh has a population of 1,535,900.

We estimate Patuakhali has 1,924 people who might know Jesus, 4,608 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,529,368 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Patuakhali, Barisal, Bangladesh.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight
